Entries.Rainy_Night_3: The rain makes our home seem so cozy.$h^It's nights like this I'm glad we have a quality roof.
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I'm glad you're home.#$e#I get kind of scared alone at night.$s^I get lonely at night...$s#$e#...$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Alex: I feel exhausted... That's a good sign! It means I worked hard enough today.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_Elliott: #$c .5#You always smell so good after a day of hard work. Like a cinnamon leaf floating in the summer breeze.#$e#Come here, let me massage your back. You look tense.$l

Changes.LogName: Fix MarriageDialogue - Modded Dialogue + Custom Pronouns - Plural
